results.title: Farnesyl pyrophosphate potentiates dendritic cell migration in autoimmunity through mitochondrial remodelling.
results.text_hl: Mechanistically, @CHEMICAL_farnesyl_pyrophosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C004808 @@@FPP@@@-dependent @GENE_RHOA @GENE_387 @@@RhoA@@@ geranylgeranylation promotes @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial@@@ fusion and oxidative respiration through @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial@@@ @GENE_RHOA @GENE_387 @@@RhoA@@@-MFN interaction, which subsequently facilitates the resolution of endoplasmic reticulum stress in @GENE_CXCL9 @GENE_4283 @@@mig@@@-DCs. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@, a chemical inhibitor of the @CHEMICAL_Mevalonic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008798 @@@mevalonate@@@ pathway, restores @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial@@@ function in @GENE_CXCL9 @GENE_4283 @@@mig@@@-DCs and ameliorates systemic pathogenesis in @<m>DISEASE_Lupus_Erythematosus_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008180 @@@SLE@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang X, Chen Y, Sun G, Fei Y, Zhu H, Liu Y, Dan J, Li C, Cao X, Liu J. Farnesyl pyrophosphate potentiates dendritic cell migration in autoimmunity through mitochondrial remodelling. Nat Metab. 2024 Oct 18;():. PMID: 39425002

results.title: Simvastatin treatment ameliorates autoimmune disease associated with accelerated atherosclerosis in a murine lupus model.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment ameliorates @DISEASE_Autoimmune_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001327 @@@autoimmune disease@@@ associated with accelerated @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Lupus_Erythematosus_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008180 @@@lupus@@@ model.

results.title: Therapy with statins in patients with refractory rheumatic diseases: a preliminary study.
results.text_hl: A significant reduction in spontaneous apoptosis of peripheral blood lymphocytes and expression of @GENE_CD69 @GENE_969 @@@CD69@@@ and HLA-DR was observed in @<m>DISEASE_Lupus_Erythematosus_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008180 @@@SLE@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ after @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy.
